titleStmt.title: Rules and directions to be observed by the ware-house-keeper, and by the severall officers of the customes, and others that shall make any stay or seizures, or demises of any goods or merchandizes for custome-causes within the port of London
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Commissioners of Customs.
